Name: Pyudon
Notes: A flying bird enemy that smacks onto the player if they walk under it. It can be defeated by stomping, Ground Pounds, Spin Attacks or by having Yoshi eat it, which causes it to drop a Coin or three Star Bits.

SW_A.Description: If used, it will stay passive while the switch is not activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

ScoreAttack.Description: This object scores 100 points in The Chimp's challenges.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted, frozen and defeated by player 2.

YoshiTargetable.Description: Can be targeted and eaten by Yoshi.
